attributes.comment:
I disagree with these proposed fee increases. Individuals who use these services
to be become legal residents or citizens of the United States (and other services)
face enough financial hardships, these increases only make it more difficult for law-
abiding indivuduals to receive the services they need. Clearly we are sending the
wrong message to these inidivuals that they are not welcome here, this is excatly
the opposite of the principals this country was founded on. Furthermore, these
increases mean it is only more likely that indivuals will continue to reside in the
country illegally. Instead of raising fees astronomically, alternate means of funding
from the govemment should be found if more money is indeed required.
Furthermore, raising fees to possibly only maintain service levels and processing
time is absolutely unacceptable. The agency should find a way to operate more
efficiently, improve processing time, and restructure/get alternate funding, rather
than adding fees.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
